title: A Very Strange Smartphone...
description: Panasonic CM1 -   Is this the greatest smartphone camera of all time? Or is it the greatest camera smartphone? I'm confused, but this thing sure does take nice pictures.  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
